description: IT's TIME! We are celebrating the soft launch of our climate solution with an exceptional event, enabling dozens of projects to tap into climate positivity for free! Our closest partners have each nominated six web3 projects to participate in a massive competition about being in the first wave to enjoy automated regeneration. In order to receive this benefit, the projects will require your vote! Your CODE will be visible on April 20th. --> Join the Decentraland Metaverse Event on April 21st; vote for your favorite project and redeem an exceptional wearable!!
name: Menthol Protocol x Polygon Network
